articles.description: Emma Heming Willis called out general misinformation about 'neurocognitive disease' and set the record straight after seeing false headlines online about her husband Bruce Willis' health in an Instagram post on Sunday.
articles.content:
Emma Heming Willis wants to set the record straight on how misguided media coverage of neurocognitive diseases can affect families including her own.
In a candid video posted on Instagram Sunday, Em… [+3538 chars]
